TopicTitle: Fun little video of astronauts tripping

Articles.Content:
http://i.imgur.com/JoLgOG3.webm

I love the dust they kick up...just going ballistically, and not behaving like we'd expect on earth
It looks painless. And unlike Kerbal Space Program where all Kerbals standing up in any planet the same animation.
At least one of those guys thought he was going to die, as he feared he would land on his backpack and he knew the equipment internals would not survive that hit.
